description: Dr. Mikhail Pavlichenko is Suou and Shion`s father. Dr. Pavlichenko works for a research group studying the time and space distortion effects occurring on the planet. He is also the creator of the memory eraser. He is believed to be killed by Hei, but the latter denied doing so saying that the doctor was dead when he arrived. He`s shown to be alive and well with Shion back in Japan, showing that his death was faked. His wife, Nakimiya Asako, also reveals that he is involved with The Syndicate. After being reunited with Suou, he is mortally wounded while rescuing her from government forces and dies.
name: Mikhail Pavlichenko
